site.title: Ocean Express CR
site.description: OceanExpress CR, a company committed to providing personalized and high-quality international cargo transportation services.

meta.title: Privacy
meta.description: Review our Privacy Policy to learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. This page outlines our commitment to your privacy and data security when you use our services and website.

0.title: Information of the Data Controller
0.subtitle: Ocean Express CR is the company responsible as the legal entity in charge of data processing. For any communication, its physical address is located in the contact section of the website, and its email is 'info@oceanexpresscr.com.'

1.title: General Statement
1.subtitle: Ocean Express CR respects your right to privacy and will not collect any personal information about you on this website without your explicit permission. Any personal data you provide, if retained, will be kept on secure servers.
1.subtitle2: The nature of the Internet is such that we cannot guarantee or secure the transmission of any information you transmit to us over the Internet. However, we will take all reasonable measures (including appropriate technical and organizational measures) to protect your personal data.

2.title: Type of Data Collected and Its Purpose
2.subtitle: Ocean Express CR may collect two types of information about you from our sites: (a) Personal information that identifies you or can be used to identify or contact you and may include your name, company, or email address. Ocean Express CR does not collect any personal data about you on this website, except for the information you voluntarily provide (e.g., by sending us an email or completing one of our online forms or voluntary registration for the services that Ocean Express CR offers). If you choose not to provide the necessary personal information when requested, certain services or parts of the sites may not be available to you. (b) Aggregate information generated by the systems of Ocean Express CR, which, like most websites, tracks traffic to and from the sites but does not personally identify you.

3.title: Use of Information
3.subtitle: Ocean Express CR may use the information it collects: (a) to verify your identity and assist you in any Ocean Express CR registration services; (b) to assist in providing the services requested by you; (c) to provide you with more information about other websites and services that Ocean Express CR considers may be of interest to you; (d) to share with third parties who have similar (in whole or in part) non-profit purposes to Ocean Express CR when the exchange is for a non-profit purpose; (e) for future marketing, promotion, and advertising activities related to Ocean Express CR or its purpose, including direct marketing, event invitations and activities, market research, and surveys; (f) to help ensure that you are shown information that the company considers relevant to you and your interests; and (g) for any other use that you authorize.

4.title: User Consent
4.subtitle: User consent to collect and process their personal data is obtained when visiting the website; however, their personal or business information will only be used if the user decides to contact the company for any purpose.

5.title: User Rights
5.subtitle: Users have rights regarding their data, including the right of access, rectification, cancellation, and opposition (ARCO rights). If the user needs to modify any communication line, they must send an email to 'info@oceanexpresscr.com.'

6.title: Retention, Correction, and Update
6.subtitle: Any personal information provided to Ocean Express CR will be collected and maintained by Ocean Express CR and/or its authorized agents and associates. The collected information will be safeguarded by the company indefinitely or until the client decides to terminate the professional relationship and explicitly requests it.
6.subtitle2: If you are a natural person, you have certain rights under the 'LAW FOR THE PROTECTION OF THE INDIVIDUAL AGAINST THE PROCESSING OF HIS PERSONAL DATA. Law No. 8968' that Costa Rica has. We will correct any personal information we have about you if you notify us in writing of the correction. If you have any questions about how Ocean Express CR services work or about this Privacy Policy, please contact Ocean Express CR by sending an email to 'info@oceanexpresscr.com.'

7.title: Data Security
7.subtitle: To protect users' personal data, the company maintains the website code within a repository protected by two companies, Github and Netlify, both of which safeguard the company's data. Additionally, through the company's own domain, guarded with appropriate filters on GoDaddy, an additional layer is generated. The company's emails are managed through Gmail by Google, providing an additional layer of protection for user information.

8.title: Sharing Data with Third Parties
8.subtitle: We will not disclose your personal data to third parties unless you have consented to such disclosure. If the user undergoes a service purchasing process with the company, some personal, professional, or business data may be shared with business partners to develop the relevant service.
8.subtitle2: We may disclose with your consent: (a) any information that Ocean Express CR collects about you to third parties for the purpose of providing services that Ocean Express CR considers may be of interest to you; (b) aggregated tracking information and other information that does not personally identify you, to third parties; (c) your personal information to third parties when Ocean Express CR believes in good faith that we are required to do so by law.

9.title: Content Providers, Advertisers, and Partners
9.subtitle: Ocean Express CR does not control the practices of content providers or partners on our sites. Our partners' sites contain links to other sites, which may not follow the same privacy policies as Ocean Express CR. Ocean Express CR suggests verifying any relevant privacy policy before providing personal information to any third party.

10.title: Cookies and Tracking
10.subtitle: Website cookies are small text files that can be placed on your computer by the websites you visit. They are widely used to make websites work as intended and enhance user experiences.
10.subtitle2: Ocean Express CR does not collect personally identifiable information through website cookies. Ocean Express CR may use a 'cookie' file containing information that can identify details such as your IP address, PC platform (e.g., Windows, NT, or Mac), browser (e.g., Internet Explorer, Firefox, or another, plus the browser version), domain (whether accessing a site from CR or elsewhere), and other user information (e.g., your username).
10.subtitle3: Ocean Express CR may use the information generated by cookies to: (a) track traffic patterns to, from, and within the sites; (b) assist in displaying advertisements to appropriate users; and (c) allow you to access the sites, use certain services, and visit areas only for registered site users. You can choose to manage your cookies. Most web browsers allow some control over most cookies through browser settings. For more information about cookies, including how to view which cookies have been set and how to manage and delete them, visit: 'http://www.aboutcookies.org/'

11.title: International Data Transfers
11.subtitle: In the case of international data transfers outside of Costa Rica, user data will be protected by the terms and conditions, and the privacy policy, of the companies of our business partners with whom the same will have already been agreed to share. In the event of a user data breach, Ocean Express CR will resort to the legal statutes where our codes are stored. If they do not safeguard the user's rights, the company is not held responsible.

12.title: Changes to the Website Privacy Policy
12.subtitle: Any changes to this Website Privacy Policy will be posted on this website so that you are always informed about what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we disclose it.

13.title: Contact for Inquiries
13.subtitle: We appreciate feedback and suggestions regarding the privacy policy of Ocean Express CR. Please send any questions about it or the information we have collected from you to 'info@oceanexpresscr.com'. If you believe that your personal information has been misused or handled contrary to the established policy, please contact us at 'info@oceanexpresscr.com.'

14.title: Miscellaneous
14.subtitle: This policy and any issues or disputes related to privacy concerns will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Costa Rica, without regard to any choice of law provisions. This Privacy Policy and the Terms and Conditions constitute the entire agreement between the parties related to the use of the Website and the personal information collected by Ocean Express CR.

meta.title: Terms
meta.description: Explore our Terms and Conditions to understand the rules and guidelines governing the use of our services and website. This page provides detailed information about your rights and responsibilities as a user.

0.title: Definitions
0.subtitle: These terms and conditions acknowledge:
0.li0: User(s): any human or non-human entity accessing the website to browse, study, or initiate any form of relationship with the company.
0.li1: Company: recognized as Ocean Express CR..
0.li2: Site: understood as the online platform providing content or services accessible via the internet through web browsers. The site in question is enabled by the link 'www.oceanexpresscr.com.'

1.title: General Statement
1.subtitle: These terms and conditions apply to all users of the site. Access to the site is free and does not create any commercial, contractual, or professional relationship of any kind between users and Ocean Express CR unless users decide to establish a commercial relationship with the company. However, if new sections offering specific services are added to the site in the future, Ocean Express CR may include them in this document as an additional section.
1.subtitle2: When the site includes access to testimonials for users, these may express the professional and personal opinions or thoughts of customers on a wide range of topics related to the services provided by the company. The content of these testimonials and the links included in them to other external sites will be reviewed, monitored, or approved by the company, the editor of the content of such testimonials, or the sites accessible through them. The text, as well as any other material published in them, reflects the opinion of a specific author and not the opinion of Ocean Express CR. If, for any reason, you believe that the published information is offensive, please notify the Administration at info@oceanexpresscr.com. Users agree not to access or attempt to access another user's account, and not to falsify or attempt to falsify their identity while using the site or any of the systems they are permitted to access.
1.subtitle3: The user must refer to the specific conditions established for accessing and using specific services within the Ocean Express CR brand website, as detailed below.

2.title: Permission for the use of materials
2.subtitle: As part of the user agreement with the Terms and Conditions contained herein, Ocean Express CR will provide unique and non-transferable access in the future (for those sections that require it). This is intended to create a space for expressing professional opinions about our services, and it will be reviewed as specified above.

3.title: Limitations of use
3.subtitle: The user agrees to use the site only for legal purposes. As the user accepts the above terms, if a third party claims that any material posted on the site is illegal, the user will be responsible for demonstrating that the material in question complies with applicable laws. In addition, Ocean Express CR reserves the right to remove material from the site, block access, or take any other action regarding posted material, at its discretion, although it is not obliged to do so. The user may not use Ocean Express CR's data resources to distribute unsolicited advertising or any promotional material of any kind.

4.title: Hyperlinks
4.subtitle: This site contains links to sites outside the Ocean Express CR domain. The respective owners of these sites are responsible for the content of their sites, and Ocean Express CR neither guarantees nor approves such content.

5.title: Responsibilities
5.subtitle: This site, as well as any information or services related to it, is provided 'as is', with the warranty that the information is real and relevant.
5.subtitle2: Regarding external sites, Ocean Express CR disclaims any warranty, whether express or implied, regarding the accuracy, suitability, or completeness of a site, the information obtained on it, or the link. Ocean Express CR does not guarantee that these sites will operate without interruptions or errors, or that they are free of viruses or other harmful components. The use of information obtained through these sites is at the user's own risk. In particular, Ocean Express CR will not assume responsibility for indirect, punitive, special, incidental, foreseeable, or unforeseeable consequential damages (including, but not limited to, defamation claims, errors, loss of data, or disruption of data availability) related to these terms and conditions, the use or inability to use a site, any post a user may make on the site, or the reliability of information obtained through a site.
5.subtitle3: The user is responsible for any damage and/or injury of any nature that may arise from a breach of these terms and conditions or any other applicable regulations, and as such, Ocean Express CR is released from all administrative, civil, criminal, or any other type of liability.

6.title: Privacy
6.subtitle: This site is governed by the privacy policy that complies with the data protection laws of Costa Rica. This policy can be accessed within the Support section located at the end of each section of the website.

7.title: Other Legal Aspects
7.subtitle: This site complies with specific laws of Costa Rica, including commercial regulations and intellectual property laws.

8.title: Legal Procedures
8.subtitle: This site, the company, and the users are governed by Costa Rican laws. Therefore, the legal procedures to be followed in case of disputes or legal issues adhere to the guidelines of the legal system of Costa Rica.

9.title: Modifications
9.subtitle: The company reserves the right to make changes to the terms and conditions on the site and to notify users of such modifications.

10.title: Other
10.subtitle: This site may contain errors or omissions in its information. Ocean Express CR reserves the right to correct these errors or omissions.

404.title: Sorry, we couldn't find this page.
404.subtitle: But don't worry, you can find many other things on our website.

hero.title: We Transport Your Maritime, Air, and Land Cargo
hero.subtitle: We are a company dedicated to providing a personalized service.

home.brands: Get to know some of our partners:

company.title: Personalized Service: Over 20 Years of History
company.subtitle: We are a company committed to providing personalized and high-quality international cargo transportation services. We guide our clients in the export and import of their goods, assisting them in making the best decisions: secure, cost-effective, and tailored to their needs.We also offer customs clearance, cargo nationalization services, and parcel shipments.

services.title: Dedication to Excellence and Service
services.subtitle: At Ocean Express CR, we specialize in tailored international cargo transportation solutions. With a global network of trusted partners and a focus on personalized service, we ensure that your shipments reach their destination with care and efficiency.

card0.title: International Cargo Transportation
card0.subtitle: We provide comprehensive solutions for air, sea, and land transportation to and from around the world, connecting Costa Rica to the global trade network.

card1.title: Nationalization of Goods
card1.subtitle: We streamline customs processes, allowing a seamless transition from the arrival of cargo at Costa Rican fiscal warehouses to its final destination.

card2.title: Parcel Services
card2.subtitle: We offer specialized parcel services for smaller shipments, ensuring careful handling and timely deliveries tailored to your logistical needs.

features.title: We prioritize your satisfaction and convenience through our commitment to personalized service.

card1.title: Expert Guidance for Your Specific Needs
card1.subtitle: With over two decades in the market, we have advised numerous clients, providing customized solutions that optimize their international logistics processes.

card2.title: Detailed and Updated Shipment Tracking
card2.subtitle: Every day, we monitor and update the status of multiple shipments, ensuring your merchandise moves smoothly from origin to destination and keeping you informed throughout the process.

card3.title: Flexibility to Adapt to Your Changing Requirements
card3.subtitle: In a constantly evolving business world, our flexibility means adjusting our services to meet your changing needs, ensuring a seamless flow of merchandise

card4.title: Swift Response to Your Inquiries and Requirements
card4.subtitle: Our efficient structure, personnel, and processes enable us to respond quickly to your inquiries and requirements, offering timely solutions to meet your logistical demands.

cta-box.title: Do you wish to get in touch?
cta-box.subtitle: Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or inquiries you may have, and we'll be sure to promptly connect with you.

meta.description: Discover how our logistics company excels in personalized service for international shipping, customs clearance, and parcel delivery. We ensure seamless, efficient, and reliable logistics solutions tailored to your needs. Experience hassle-free global shipping with us.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: We specialize in tailor-made solutions, supported by a global network of trusted partners and an unwavering focus on personalized service.

about.title: What Sets Us Apart
about.subtitle: At Ocean Express CR, our dedication extends beyond merely transporting cargo: we provide personalized service. For over 20 years, we've been addressing the logistical needs of our clients, delivering excellence in every aspect. We aim to inspire our team and business partners to give their best each day. Here's why we stand out in the Costa Rican and global market
about.bullet0: Personalized Commitment: We offer our clients tailored services, ensuring expert guidance and personalized attention at every stage of the logistics process.
about.bullet1: Experience and Track Record: With over two decades in the industry, we strive to grow globally, providing personalized services that meet our clients' logistical needs. We create opportunities for personal development and success.
about.bullet2: Global Network of Connections: Our extensive network of trusted partners worldwide ensures secure and timely transportation to and from various countries, meeting rigorous quality standards.

team.title: Our Staff
team.subtitle: Meet our team of dedicated professionals

member1.name: Danilo Moreira Ramírez
member1.bio: As the co-founder and president of Ocean Express CR, Danilo has been leading the company since its inception in 2004. He oversees the company's finances, personnel, and coordinates all aspects related to sales and operations. Recognizing the importance of providing personalized service to clients, he maintains that this achievement wouldn't be possible without the support of his employees. He has learned to lead with humility and firmly believes that his team provides a unique professional closeness.

member2.name: Andrés Zumbado Castillo
member2.bio: Andrés has been collaborating with us since 2015 and currently serves as the Sales and Operations Executive at Ocean Express CR. Over time, he has acquired the necessary experience to handle any situation with dedicated attention to both new and existing clients in their international freight needs. He sees numerous opportunities in the market, making the pursuit of new challenges and opportunities highly appealing.

member3.name: Yorleny Alfaro-Jiménez
member3.bio: Yorleny contributes to the company as the General Accountant and Financial Analyst. She has been with us since 2014, handling tasks ranging from reviewing, analyzing, and recording various commercial documents to assessing the financial situation of the company. She enjoys witnessing her experience enriching with changes in different accounting practices. Her extensive experience at Ocean Express CR has been fulfilling, particularly due to the complexities involved in financial changes.

member4.name: Carlos Moreira-Álvarez
member4.bio: Carlos joined the family business in 2023 and currently collaborates as an external project coordination consultant. His responsibilities include project management, digital innovation, workflow optimization, and support in human talent management, among others. Carlos is passionate about studying and improving existing processes and relationships. Through social sciences, he brings a fresh perspective to negotiations within the company.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: We aim to provide personalized logistic solutions and excellence in every service, inspiring optimal development in our collaborators and partners as we grow globally.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: To be leaders and innovators in the logistics service market, facilitating international trade for SMEs in Costa Rica with transparency and efficiency.

values.title: Values
values.subtitle: Our values are the essence of how we work, reflecting the best of Ocean Express CR

value0.title: Passion
value0.subtitle: We enhance our service by committing to each task, dedicating heart and mind to fulfill our mission and vision.

value1.title: Loyalty
value1.subtitle: We establish strong alliances and a firm commitment with suppliers, customers, and ourselves to deliver the best possible service.

value2.title: Quality
value2.subtitle: We work on every task efficiently, quickly, and personally, constantly striving for excellence for our customers.

value3.title: Responsibility
value3.subtitle: We seek to ensure success in the timely delivery of merchandise to our customers.

trajectory.title: Our Journey
trajectory.text: Ocean Express CR, forged by Danilo and Teresita amid economic challenges, emerged in 2004, thriving during the maritime boom. Danilo's managerial expertise has defined our global logistical journey, while Teresita played a pivotal role for 15 years until her retirement in 2022. Numerous collaborators enriched our path, and strategic alliances in land and air services enhanced our global operations. Our impact is also evident in our commitment to Corporate Social Responsibility: supporting education, internships, and donations to NGOs and the Costa Rican Red Cross. Providing personalized service and adapting to the digital era, Ocean Express is more than a company; it's a journey of resilience, social commitment, and constant adaptation to digital demands, always guided by strong values and differentiated service.

meta.description: Explore our comprehensive range of logistics services: international shipping, customs clearance, parcel delivery, and more. We specialize in providing tailored, efficient logistics solutions for businesses and individuals alike. Partner with us for all your shipping needs.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: We successfully transport your international cargo from the point of origin to the chosen destination.

service0.title: International Cargo Transportation
service0.subtitle: We take pride in presenting this service, offering comprehensive solutions covering air, sea, and land transportation, and connecting Costa Rica with global commerce. We move your goods safely and efficiently, providing efficient deconsolidation processes, and reducing unnecessary wait times and costs. We transport your cargo from its entry into warehouses in the country of origin to its final destination. Our strengths include:
service0.bullet0: Global connections: Thanks to our network of partners worldwide, we provide access to global routes and destinations, connecting your merchandise with key international markets.
service0.bullet1: Care and Efficiency Guarantee: We handle your merchandise as if it were our own, with efficiency at every stage of the logistics process, from collection to delivery. We offer optional insurance.
service0.bullet2: Experience in Diverse Cargo: From fragile goods to full containers, we are equipped to handle a wide range of shipments, adapting our solutions to your specific needs.

service1.title: Merchandise Nationalization
service1.subtitle: This service is designed to offer customers a personalized door-to-door service. After transporting and deconsolidating your cargo, through customs services, we can nationalize your merchandise, handling all the fiscal processes involved in Costa Rica. We carefully manage the arrival and process through the Costa Rican fiscal warehouse, then deliver the merchandise to your business or preferred location. Our strengths include:
service1.bullet0: Swift Customs Process: we provide a transparent service with a 24-hour delivery of your merchandise after its entry into the Costa Rican fiscal warehouse.
service1.bullet1: Fiscal Classification of Goods: as specialists in the classification of the tariff code of the Costa Rican customs system, we safeguard your finances to avoid additional charges.
service1.bullet2: Affordable Pricing: We position our rates competitively in the market, standing out by providing a service tailored to your needs

service2.title: Parcel Services
service2.subtitle: Our parcel services are designed to meet your logistic needs for smaller shipments, providing lower costs and increased delivery agility. Our team is dedicated to carefully handling your digital purchases, ensuring timely deliveries with the same attention and professionalism, from the locker to your preferred location. Our strengths include:
service2.bullet0: Timely Shipments: We guarantee precise and on-time deliveries, even for smaller shipments, ensuring your items reach your door without delay.
service2.bullet1: Personalized Care: Each package is handled with the same level of care and attention as any larger cargo, providing peace of mind with every delivery.
service2.bullet2: Adaptable Package Sizing: From small packages to larger shipments, we are prepared to adapt to your requirements and offer personalized solutions.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Our best reference is the support from our customers and partners.

card0.description: Importer of Buses and Parts Villalobos and Sánchez S.R.L.
card0.name: Luis Christian Villalobos, General Manager
card0.quote: We have had the opportunity to work with Ocean Express CR for over 20 years, during which we have developed a valuable relationship of work and friendship. We have always valued and appreciated the excellent service, the outstanding treatment, and the professionalism with which they have helped us grow, providing us with very competitive rates and guidance in import logistics.

card1.name: Oscar Villalobos, General Manager
card1.quote: Our company has been using Ocean Express CR services for many years. Starting with export services, we have now negotiated both cargo importation and merchandise nationalization. Consequently, we have become excellent business partners. Ocean Express CR continues to be a trusted ally, providing us with more than just a great service and dedication to meet our company's needs.

card2.name: Denis Zúniga, General Director
card2.quote: As the director of the company, I can highlight the attention provided by Ocean Express CR and its staff. They strive to offer the best service, understanding the specific needs of our company and seeking solutions that better fit those needs. We look forward to continuing and strengthening our relationship in the areas of customs services, freight management, international insurance, and the advice they provide in many other aspects related to the aforementioned.

card3.name: Eddie Jiménez, Financial and Accounting Department
card3.quote: Our relationship with Ocean Express CR began over 20 years ago. Over this time, they have advised and assisted us with all import procedures from different parts of the world. They have consistently performed this task with professionalism, punctuality, and always considering the well-being of the company I represent. Therefore, we are confident that this relationship will continue for many more years.

question0.title: Do you offer door-to-door service?
question0.subtitle: Yes, at Ocean Express CR, we provide comprehensive door-to-door service, ensuring that your merchandise is picked up from its location of origin and delivered to its final destination safely and promptly.

question1.title: Do you provide customs brokerage services?
question1.subtitle: Yes, Ocean Express CR offers customs brokerage services, easing the necessary procedures and processes for the clearance of your merchandise through Costa Rican customs.

question2.title: From which countries do you transport merchandise?
question2.subtitle: Ocean Express CR provides cargo transport to and from various countries around the world, ensuring a global network of connections to meet your international logistics needs. Our cargo transportation services cover all countries except those in high international conflict.

meta.description: Get in touch with our logistics experts for personalized support on international shipping, customs clearance, and parcel services. Contact us today for efficient logistics solutions and exceptional customer service. We're here to assist with all your shipping needs.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Your satisfaction is our priority, and we are here to help drive your international logistics.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: We would love to assist you, please send us a message and we will get in touch with you.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.subtitle: Through this section, we offer you a direct way to contact us. Whether you have questions or inquiries or need personalized advice, our team of experts is ready to meet your needs. Our priority is to provide you with a personalized and efficient service.
contact.name: Name

placeholder.name: Juan Pérez
placeholder.message: Please provide details about your inquiry or comment here.

meta.description: Find answers to your logistics queries in our FAQs. Learn about international shipping, customs clearance, parcel services, and more. Our comprehensive FAQ section provides insights and solutions for your shipping challenges. Visit now for expert guidance.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: At Ocean Express CR, we value clarity and transparency in our communication with our clients.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Explore this section for answers to your concerns and make the most of our transportation and logistics services. If you don't find the answer you need, feel free to contact us; we are here to assist you.

question0.title: Do you offer door-to-door service?
question0.subtitle: Yes, at Ocean Express CR, we provide comprehensive door-to-door service, ensuring that your merchandise is picked up from its location of origin and delivered to its final destination safely and promptly.

question1.title: Do you provide customs brokerage services?
question1.subtitle: Yes, Ocean Express CR offers customs brokerage services, easing the necessary procedures and processes for the clearance of your merchandise through Costa Rican customs.

question2.title: From which countries do you transport merchandise?
question2.subtitle: Ocean Express CR provides cargo transport to and from various countries around the world, ensuring a global network of connections to meet your international logistics needs. Our cargo transportation services cover all countries except those in high international conflict.

question3.title: What is the maritime transit time from Miami to Costa Rica?
question3.subtitle: The maritime transit time from Miami (USA) to Costa Rica varies depending on the route and type of service. Our team will provide you with precise information about the estimated time for your particular shipment.

question4.title: What is the air transit time from Miami to Costa Rica?
question4.subtitle: The air transit time from Miami (USA) to Costa Rica varies depending on the airline and the specific route. Our team will provide detailed information based on your shipment.

question5.title: Can you pick up merchandise at the supplier's location?
question5.subtitle: Yes, we provide the service of picking up merchandise at your supplier's location, facilitating the process and ensuring efficient logistics from origin to final delivery.

question6.title: How should the cargo be delivered?
question6.subtitle: TThe cargo should be properly packed and prepared for transportation. Our team can provide guidance on specific requirements to ensure a successful delivery.

question7.title: How is the cubic volume of cargo calculated?
question7.subtitle: The cubic volume of cargo is calculated by multiplying the length, width, and height of the cargo, all measurements in meters. Our team will assist you in this process to ensure accuracy in measurement.

cta.title: Do you have more questions?
cta.subtitle: Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or inquiries you may have, and we'll be sure to promptly connect with you.

cta-box.title: Would you like to get in touch?
cta-box.subtitle: Write to us about any inquiries you may have and we'll get back to you.
